definitions.definition: The act of domesticating , or accustoming to home; the action of taming wild animals or breeding plants.
The act of domesticating, or making a legal instrument recognized and enforceable in a jurisdiction foreign to the one in which the instrument was originally issued or created.
The act of domesticating a text.

main_definition: The act of domesticating , or accustoming to home; the action of taming wild animals or breeding plants.
secondary_definitions: The act of domesticating, or making a legal instrument recognized and enforceable in a jurisdiction foreign to the one in which the instrument was originally issued or created.
( translation studies ) The act of domesticating a text.
